quote: If you don't believe in the things you're doing, the answer isn't fooling yourself into thinking you believe it. If you don't believe in what you're doing, then you just shouldn't be doing it.
quote_letters: IF YOU DONT BELIEVE IN THE THINGS YOURE DOING THE ANSWER ISNT FOOLING YOURSELF INTO THINKING YOU BELIEVE IT IF YOU DONT BELIEVE IN WHAT YOURE DOING THEN YOU JUST SHOULDNT BE DOING IT
